html:
10.15.20  9:12 pm   Hey Bill, just wanted to say I found the fun of playing piano without a consistent tempo (kinda changing tempo based on the feeling of the song). Is there a word for that?

     rubato

     Have you ever used it in your stuff?

     yes

10.15.20  8:51 pm   thoughts on palindromes

      fake

10.15.20  8:16 pm   Is the earth a triangle

      it's trying so hard to be

10.15.20  8:14 pm   What's your favorite of your songs?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.15.20  8:05 pm   I suck at games, any tips?

      sometimes if you lose backwards you can win

10.15.20  7:44 pm   In what way is math connected to music?

      it helps you keep track of how many bad songs you've made, vs how many good ones. so you can determine the proper punishment

10.15.20  7:36 pm   RGB or CMYK or do you have another favorite color set?

      hsv for sure, but unfortunately this is not usually natively accessible without some hectic conversion tactics

10.15.20  7:14 pm   How do you feel about "History of the entire world... I guess"?

      i must admit it's pretty reckless to claim to tell all of world history by yourself

10.15.20  7:07 pm   holy shit why are so many of your songs in F# major?

      the only reason for that is i've done a lot of songs. i try to use all keys equally, with the POSSIBLE exception of C, which i might use slightly less often simply because it's exactly what my enemies would expect

10.15.20  6:25 pm   im actually influenced by how much you learn and want to learn. id like to learn more myself but i have problems actually having the motivation to do such a thing. any tips to help a procrastinator? 

      i'm getting mixed messages. it sounds like you both do and don't want to do it. if you're having trouble making a decision, maybe there's a way you could half way do it

10.15.20  6:21 pm   Any hints on your new project?

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

10.15.20  5:07 pm   is there a difference between A-7 and A7

      that to me looks like Aminor7, and Adominant7. to most readers that will mean, if it's Aminor7, it will include the C note, but if it's A7 it would include the C# note instead

10.15.20  4:15 pm   is cereal made out of rock 

      no, but, if you wait long enough, a rock can be made out of cereal

10.15.20  3:42 pm   what to dress up as on halloween?

      the next president of the united states

10.15.20  2:05 pm   What's the pythagorean theorem?

      how the heck long a diagonal line is

10.15.20  1:48 pm   what is the best video anyone has ever made ever 

      i'm more interested in the videos that can be made in the future

10.15.20  1:23 pm   How are you so wise in the ways of "nonsense", and is it possible to learn this power?

      basically what you wanna do is carve through the sense at sort of a slantward angle

10.15.20  1:22 pm   What has the simplicity police restricted you to do so far?

      they always make me cancel my dreams and stick to my other dreams, which is easier said than done

10.15.20  1:17 pm   do you ever get so distracted that you focus again?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.15.20  12:21 pm   is your next video about bread

      no but it is about the next best thing

10.15.20  12:14 pm   Do you ever get into the habit of turning to a particular motif to the point where almost every time you sit down to write something, you end up playing that? How do I stop doing this?

      this may be a slightly unexpected technique, but try writing a song as if it's appearing in a movie or some other type of video-story. imagine the scene, imagine the story, imagine as many things as you can about the world the song may live in. even if none of what you're imagining actually gets mentioned in the song, it still seems to power the songwriting tremendously, and opens up the possibilities you need. less like staring at a wall

10.15.20  11:56 am   How do I get better at playing double stroke rolls on the drum kit? 

      just start playing 2 strokes each hand, evenly, at some reasonable pace like 2 per beat, at 120bpm, and just speed up the tempo gradually. your hands will eventually figure out what you need to do. like that time when you learned to walk.
     actually wait i just remembered, here's a slightly more interesting tip .... try playing it so that the second note is actually the downbeat instead of the first note. so do like a RLLR-RLLR etc pattern, so the second stroke is the one that falls on the downbeat. and then gradually speed up from there. this way is actually very healthy to learn because it probably helps even out the strokes, by psychologically reversing the way your mind thinks of them. i just remembered that probably 80% of the doublestrokes i play are aligned this way, it's just more comfortable for me. it frees the pairs from prison of their pairing, if that makes sense. allows for stronger integration with singles actually, with more possibilities for sure. in other words it will help them not sound like doubles

10.15.20  11:29 am   i try to make music but lose motivation after a little while do you have any tips

      do something you do have motivation for. it will work better

10.15.20  11:16 am   hey what are your thoughts on calculators

      they are perfect for calculating how many calculators you have

10.15.20  10:40 am   Ok, I know everyone has asked, and you've answered "The new one" but what is your favorite song that you made, as of right now, that isn't the new one. If it can only be the new one, what is your second favorite?

      would be one of the other ones i'm gonna make soon

10.15.20  10:21 am   I think its reasonable to assume that the next song will come out sometime before the end of this century, yes?

      the most important thing to assume, is that i'm gonna do more than one song

10.15.20  9:40 am   What is your opinion on the longest name ever : Pablo Diego José Francisco de Paula Juan Nepomuceno Cipriano de la Santísima Trinidad Ruiz Picasso

      you might not want to hear this, but there are some longer names

10.15.20  9:03 am   How do you even play music?

      try tapping different combinations of twice and once. this is the basic mind game that essentially extrapolates out to all of music playing

10.15.20  8:21 am   When is the next video gonna be?

      doing it now

10.15.20  8:18 am   What is normal? 

      imagine a boat, on a ship

10.15.20  7:52 am   whats your opinion on scientology

      the perfect mix of science and zoology

10.15.20  7:12 am   How does one acquire such knowledge you are so blessed with? 

      one way is to play a game where you try to tell which is knowledge and which is anti knowledge. if you can't figure it out then you might have to make music instead

10.15.20  6:21 am   Is paper the best for writing?

      it's pretty good

10.15.20  5:01 am   What should I do while I'm waiting for you to drop more music?

      try to learn how to create scenes that are just as good as the ones from the movies

10.15.20  2:47 am   Can we expect more videos soon

      flipping hecko yes

10.15.20  2:45 am   When will you be uploading a new video?

10.15.20  12:52 am   How come no matter how much i practice, im never good enough

      because, at practice time, you never actually do it for real

10.15.20  12:18 am   What are one of the things you did that are mildly questionable?

      tried to make videos in addition to just music
